column4: Gentlemen, got a problem, my provider changed firmware of my modem/router, but without willing to give me the new administrator pw ...
is there a way to intercept their pw at coldboot of the modem ?
any router/modem should have a reset.. but wrong place to ask
firmaware has been changed and pw is hardcoded inside
wher should I ask my questionn ?
I did that but PW seems to be hardcoded in the firmware, so no access
i live in canada but i have never seen a router that can not be reset to default..
I've got one ;) so does several thousand people here
well if many people there have them, try looking for a forum or something similar for the ISP.
the same problem fore everyone, nobody s' got the administrator password
it's near certain someone else has had/fixed that before.
i would refuse service if i could not control my own equipment
too late now, the did it
